page.description: Returns name of previously active object, drilling down into container objects (embedded forms and browses)
page.discussion: The .ACTIVEPREVDRILLDOWN() method returns the name of previously active object, drilling down into container objects (embedded forms and browses). Limitations: Desktop applications only.
